entry.title: git commit -am 'Initial Commit'
entry.content:
Welcome to Every Last Morsel’s Nerd blog! After filling up an entire desktop of Stickies talking to myself, I decided to start documenting the trials and tribulations in creating ELM. I hope that these posts may to useful in others creating and designing a niche social network.

To learn more about Every Last Morsel, I’ll refer you to the homepage or you can check out our blog.

As you may know, Every Last Morsel is currently an open source project. Please check us out on github.com/aljohri/EveryLastMorsel.
